entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
